name: conceptual-seo-marketplace
description: Claude Code marketplace for WordPress, Ghost CMS, Webflow, and SEO tools

plugins.name: wordpress-crud
plugins.description: WordPress Pages CRUD, Yoast SEO, and RankMath SEO — full page management and SEO metadata via the WordPress REST API.

plugins.name: ghost-crud
plugins.description: Ghost CMS Pages CRUD operations — Create, Read, Update, and Delete pages via the Ghost Admin API with session-based JWT authentication.

plugins.name: webflow-crud
plugins.description: Webflow CMS CRUD operations — Create, Read, Update, Delete, and Publish collection items plus static page metadata via the Webflow Data API v2.
